text:
Stephen Paul Hatton (born 28 January 1948) is an Australian politician. He is a member of the Country Liberal Party. He served as Chief Minister of the Northern Territory from 1986 to 1988. He was also a member of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly for Nightcliff from 1983 to 2001.
Hatton was born in Sydney, New South Wales.

annotations.surface_form: Chief Minister of the Northern Territory
